welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Crossville, the charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly community. We invite you to immerse yourself in our small town charm and discover all that Crossville has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rockwood Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Rockwood Municipal Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
